channel.title: Mac on LOVECTOR
channel.description: Recent content in Mac on LOVECTOR

item.title: Connecting to server via ssh
item.description: 1. Generate a Key Pair $ ssh-keygen -t rsa -b 4096 2. Upload your Public Key $ ssh-copy-id -i KEYNAME USERNAME@IP -p PORT 3. Connecting to server via ssh $ ssh -i KEYNAME -p 'PORT' 'USERNAME@IP' References https://www.linode.com/docs/security/authentication/use-public-key-authentication-with-ssh/
